task_id.description: Unique identifier for the task (e.g., TDS-1).

scope.description: Brief description of the subtask scope.

acceptance.description: List of acceptance criteria, such as test names.

contracts.description: List of API contracts or endpoints involved.

invariants.description: List of project invariants or constraints to uphold.

touchpoints.description: List of files or directories to touch.

commands.description: Optional list of dev commands for running or testing.

docs_to_update.description: Optional list of docs files to update in the same PR.
